Class FunctionTabulator

java.lang.Object
labs.medvid.FunctionTabulator
public class FunctionTabulator extends Object
This class performs tabulation of a piecewise mathematical function. It generates arrays of argument values (x) and corresponding function values (y), finds the maximum and minimum elements, and computes the sum and average of y-values.
